Body: hypelabs‚Äô technology enables devices to communicate directly with each other over any available radio access connectivity such as wi-fi  bluetooth  or lora  even in the absence of an internet connection  devices connected to each other form a resilient local network  a mesh network  on which they cooperate with each other  and from which they relay data on behalf of each other  end-to-end security of these communications ensures the integrity of transmitted content with only the sender and the target recipient being able to alter them   tasks backend development  mostly in python  django  and javascript frontend development  mostly in html  css  and javascript database implementation and maintenance  mostly in mysql and postgresql ensuring that the technical design  implementation and maintenance are in accordance with formulated business requirements  architectural specifications and restrictions based on regulations and compliance terms  maintaining the part of the cloud infrastructure relating the web-based services  databases and certification services developing and maintaining web-based integrations and webhooks graphics and media design  ui   ux design  development and maintenance of usability of web portals implementing the processes and tooling for managing creative and design assets optimization and maintenance of web portal and system performance  via tests such as a b tests and performance tests  via received feedback  via monitoring of issues and bugs  and via analysis of service logs provision of customer services regarding web portal and all online services technical decisions and implementation of actions for ensuring service continuity implementation of internal web-based tools for team productivity creating and maintaining documentation for technical solutions  developments and decisions collaborating with the rest of the development team for improving development methodologies  work pipeline  knowledge base and tooling set   requirements  minimal skills software development python - preferably with the django framework  html  css and javascript - preferably with a modern framework such as angular or react  ecmascript use of versioning and repository systems - preferably git knowledge on best practices for web development  such as the isolation of functionalities for html  css  and javascript ability to write  document and maintain good-quality code that is light-weight  straight-forward and intelligible knowledge in software architecture and design  such as design patterns and oop knowledge and security concepts  issues and measures effective communication and collaboration  preferable skills understanding of cloud infrastructure services - preferably aws with the administration portal and tooling understanding of rest concepts and restful web-services understanding of service scaling concepts and methodologies understanding of web-site performance profiling and optimization understanding of web-based integrations  webhooks  and third-party authentication concepts   requirements 3  years of experience in full-stack web development 3  years of experience in database design and management - preferably with mysql experience with devops processes and tools is highly preferred hands-on experience with system administration is highly preferred highly responsible  self-driven attitude ability to adapt to the fast-paced start-up culture   benefits competitive remuneration  stock options  health insurance dynamic work environment with a young  innovative and diverse team
